author: Adam Barnhardt
title: Southpark Wave 2 Funko POPs Announced
text:
Southpark Wave 2 Funko POPs Announced Adam Barnhardt   
In another exciting week for the folks at Funko , it’s been revealed at Toy Fair NY 2017 that the toy giant would be releasing another wave of characters from Comedy Central ’s South Park as a part of their wildly popular Funko POPs line. 
This second wave, which is slated for release later this year, features five characters from the often-controversial show — Stan, Kyle, Professor Chaos, Terrance, and Phillip.Revealed just before Christmas of last year, the first South Park wave has been released as of this month. Including the Hot Topic-exclusive Zombie Kenny POP!, the first wave also included versions of Cartman, Butters, Ike Broflovski, and Mysterion for a total of ten POP! figures between the two waves. 
While production on the second wave is more than likely months away, you can see the tentative concept art, as released by Funko, in the gallery below.
